model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Neighbors A, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Neighbors A: Haha, that was a good one! Aren't you glad I pushed you into the cold water?
Neighbors B: No, I'm not glad. That was completely uncalled for.
Neighbors A: Oh come on, it was just a joke. Lighten up a bit.
Neighbors B: It wasn't funny. You shouldn't push people like that, especially into cold water.
Neighbors A: Fine, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to upset you. Let's just forget about it.
Neighbors B: Okay, but just don't do it again.
Neighbors A: I won't. So, do you remember the time when I mowed the lawn with that old push mower?
Neighbors B: Yeah, I remember that. That was pretty tough work.
Neighbors A: It was. But it was also a good workout.
Neighbors B: I prefer to work out indoors where there's air conditioning.
Neighbors A: Ha, I remember when I took off my jacket and put my feet up in your armchair. It was so warm that day.
Neighbors B: Yeah, that was a hot day. I'm glad you felt comfortable in my home though.

[MEMORY]
Neighbors A and B are on friendly terms and enjoy spending time together. They have known each other for years and have become good friends. They have not seen each other in a while and are catching up. Neighbors A and B have had conversations about the temperature in the house and how it feels hotter outside. Both Neighbors A and B enjoy spending time outside, even if it involves doing chores like mowing the lawn.

raw_prediction: It's always nice to relax indoors when it's scorching outside. Speaking of which, do you have any plans for the weekend?
